member.name: T:Caliburn.Unity.UnityAdapter
member.summary: An adapter allowing an to plug into Caliburn via and .

member.name: M:Caliburn.Unity.UnityAdapter.#ctor(Microsoft.Practices.Unity.IUnityContainer)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Caliburn.Unity.UnityAdapter.DoGetInstance(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: When implemented by inheriting classes, this method will do the actual work of resolving the requested service instance.
member.param: Name of registered service you want. May be null.

member.name: M:Caliburn.Unity.UnityAdapter.DoGetAllInstances(System.Type)
member.summary: When implemented by inheriting classes, this method will do the actual work of resolving all the requested service instances.

member.name: M:Caliburn.Unity.UnityAdapter.ConfigureWith(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Caliburn.Core.ComponentInfo})
member.summary: Configures the container with the provided components.
